trans-unit.source: Creates collections that ignore the case in strings.
trans-unit.target: Cria coleções ignorar as maiúsculas e minúsculas nas cadeias.

trans-unit.source: These methods generate a case-insensitive instance of the collection using case-insensitive implementations of the hash code provider and the comparer.
trans-unit.target: Estes métodos de geram uma instância sensível da coleção sensível implementações do fornecedor de código hash e o comparador a utilizar.

trans-unit.source: The resulting instance can be used like any other instances of that class, although it may behave differently.
trans-unit.target: A instância resultante pode ser utilizada como quaisquer outras instâncias dessa classe, apesar de este pode comportar-se de forma diferente.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose two objects with the keys "hello" and "HELLO" are to be added to a hash table.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, suponha que dois objetos com as chaves "Olá" e "Olá" está a ser adicionado a uma tabela hash.

trans-unit.source: A case-sensitive hash table would create two different entries; whereas, a case-insensitive hash table would throw an exception when adding the second object.
trans-unit.target: Uma tabela hash de maiúsculas e minúsculas criaria duas entradas diferentes; enquanto, uma tabela hash sensível seria acionar uma excepção ao adicionar o objeto segundo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionsUtil"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionsUtil"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new case-insensitive instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> class with the default initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância sensível do <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> classe com capacidade inicial predefinida.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the CreateCaseInsensitiveHashtable method, use the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IEqualityComparer%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor to create a case-insensitive <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> class.
trans-unit.target: Em vez de utilizar o método CreateCaseInsensitiveHashtable, utilize o <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IEqualityComparer%29?displayProperty=fullName>construtor para criar um sensível <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>classe.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IEqualityComparer%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A new case-insensitive instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> class with the default initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância sensível do <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> classe com capacidade inicial predefinida.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entries from the specified dictionary to a new case-insensitive instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> class with the same initial capacity as the number of entries copied.
trans-unit.target: Copia as entradas de dicionário especificado para uma nova instância sensível do <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> classe com a mesma capacidade inicial como o número de entradas copiados.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the CreateCaseInsensitiveHashtable method, use the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Collections.IEqualityComparer%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor to create a case-insensitive <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> class.
trans-unit.target: Em vez de utilizar o método CreateCaseInsensitiveHashtable, utilize o <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Collections.IEqualityComparer%29?displayProperty=fullName>construtor para criar um sensível <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>classe.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Collections.IEqualityComparer%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> to copy to a new case-insensitive <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>para copiar para uma nova sensível <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A new case-insensitive instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> class containing the entries from the specified <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância sensível do <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> classe que contém as entradas de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> especificado

trans-unit.source: d is .
trans-unit.target: dis .

trans-unit.source: Creates a new case-insensitive instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> class with the specified initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância sensível do <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> classe com a capacidade inicial especificada.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the CreateCaseInsensitiveHashtable method, use the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.IEqualityComparer%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor to create a case-insensitive <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> class.
trans-unit.target: Em vez de utilizar o método CreateCaseInsensitiveHashtable, utilize o <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.IEqualityComparer%29?displayProperty=fullName>construtor para criar um sensível <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>classe.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.IEqualityComparer%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The approximate number of entries that the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> can initially contain.
trans-unit.target: O número aproximado de entradas que a <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> inicialmente pode conter.

trans-unit.source: A new case-insensitive instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> class with the specified initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância sensível do <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> classe com a capacidade inicial especificada.

trans-unit.source: capacity is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: capacityé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.SortedList"></xref> class that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Collections.SortedList"> </xref> classe que ignora as maiúsculas e minúsculas de cadeias.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Collections.SortedList> instance is sorted according to the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Collections.SortedList>instância é ordenada, de acordo com o <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>.</xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> </xref:System.Collections.SortedList>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.SortedList"></xref> class that ignores the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Collections.SortedList"> </xref> classe que ignora as maiúsculas e minúsculas de cadeias.
